column3: @hebasto Will do. Not seen that repo before.

~0 on this, but if you really want to change this all over the repository in a shitton of files, I think this should be a scripted diff.\nSee https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md#scripted-diffs\n
@hebasto thanks. I'll close this PR and create one on gui using a scripted diff.
